attributes.action: Demand more media coverage In England for the sport of Showjumping!
attributes.additional_details: People have lost touch with the sport in England, which is a crime and a crying shame!
attributes.background: Showjumping coverage was for all the people. Every household knew who Harvey and David Broom were, regardless whether they rode or not! Scott Brash has just won and made history In Calgary by winning the grand slam of Showjumping £750000 prize money!
